import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './Teacher.css' import Blank from '../Image/direactor.png' import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import About from './About'; import teacher1 from '../Image/teacher1.png' import teacher2 from '../Image/teacher2.png' import teacher3 from '../Image/teacher3.png' import teacher4 from '../Image/teacher4.png' import teacher5 from '../Image/teacher5.png' import teacher6 from '../Image/teacher5.png' function Teachers() { useEffect(() => { AOS.init(); }, []) return ( <>

{item.description}
))}

{t.Experience} Exp.

))}
) } export default Teachers const principalData = [ { img: Blank, name: 'BHAWANI SHANKER SHAIRAVAT', Qualification: "BA BED MA ENGLISH , GNM,DMLT,BEMS", Experience: "Leadership Service,20 year", } ] const AboutData = [ { img: teacher1, name: 'MANISH KUMAR', Subject: "SOCIAL SCIENCE", Qualification: "BA BED MA HINDI,SOCIAL SCIENCE", Experience: "7 year", }, { img: teacher2, name: 'PINKI WADIYA', Subject: "Science", Qualification: "MSCÂ BED, MSC PHYSICS", Experience: "8 year", } , { img: teacher3, name: 'DIPAK KUMAR', Subject: "Maths", Qualification: "BSC MATH", Experience: "5 year", } , { img: teacher4, name: 'PAYAL KUMARI', Subject: "Athletic Development", Qualification: "MA BED", Experience: "3 year", }, { img: teacher5, name: 'minakshi wadiya', Subject: "SOCIAL SCIENCE", Qualification: "BA BED MA HINDI,SOCIAL SCIENCE", Experience: "7 year", }, { img: teacher6, name: 'BHARATI KUMARI', Subject: "English", Qualification: "BA BED MA ENGLISH", Experience: "9 year", } ]
